SA08n996:186: 28 anṛptā vateme sattvā lābhasatkāraślokopacaritāstṛptā sma iti pratijñānate |
SA08n996:191: sattvā hīnapānaṃ prārthayatte yadidaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānaṃ tebhya udāramatiṃ rocayiṣyāmīti yadidaṃ buddhajñānādhyālambanatayi iti tathāgatasya sattveṣu mahākaruṇotpadyate |32  ||11 ||
SA08n996:235: 15 yābhirvāridhārābhirayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturādīptaḥ pradīptaḥ saṃprajvalito'gnināekajvalībhūto nirvāpyate |
SA08n996:236: 16 imāvapi candrasūryā evaṃmaharddhika evaṃmahānubhāvā evaṃmahījaskī pāṇinā parāmṛṣati parimārjayati |
SA08n996:398: 33 śāstā sarvasattvānāṃ 34 pitā bodhisattvānāṃ 35 rājā āryapudgalānāṃ |
SA08n996:896: 78 te ca bodhisattvamahāsattvā bhūyastena sarve kumārabhūtāḥ |
SA08n996:967: 1 utpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānā dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati |
SA08n996:969: 3 utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitāya bhūyobhāvāya asaṃpramoṣāya paripūraṇāya chandaṃ janayati |
SA08n996:1186: 12 sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA08n996:1188: 14 prasrabhya kāyasaṃskārāṃ praśvasanprasrabhya kāyasaṃskārāṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA08n996:1190: 16 prītipratisaṃvedī praśvasan prītipratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA08n996:1192: 18 cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA08n996:1193: 19 prasrabhya cittasaṃskārānāśvasan prasrabhya cittasaṃskārānāśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA08n996:1194: 20 prasrabhya cittasaṃskārāṃ praśvasan prasrabhya cittasaṃskārāṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA08n996:1196: 22 cittapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | 23  ||54 ||
SA08n996:1484: viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati |1
SA08n996:1485: sa vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamādadhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāścetasa ekotībhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijñāṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati | 2
SA08n996:1486: sa prītervirāgādupekṣako viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayati yattadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimāṃ sukhaṃ vihārīti niṣprītikaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati | 3
SA08n996:1487: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati | 4
SA08n996:1499: sa sarvaśa ākāśānattyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānattavijñānamiti vijñānānattyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharati | 2
SA08n996:1500: sa sarvaśo vijñānānattyāyatanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiñcidityākiñcanyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharati | 3
SA08n996:1501: sa sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyātanaṃ samatikramya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharati | 4
SA08n996:1511: sa maitrīsahagatena cittenāvaireṇāsaṃpannenāvyābādhena vipulena mahadgatenāpramāṇenādvayena subhāvitenaikā diśamadhimucya sphāritvopasaṃpadya viharati | 5
SA08n996:1512: tathā dvitīyaṃ tathā tṛtīyaṃ tathā caturthamityūrdhamadhastiryaksarvaśaḥ sarvāvattamimaṃ lokaṃ | 6  ||70 ||
SA08n996:1515: 1 adhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyatyayaṃ dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ |
SA08n996:1516: 2 śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatyayaṃ tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ | 3
SA08n996:1517: sa sarvaśo nūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramātpratighasaṃjñānāmastaṃgamānnānātvasaṃjñānāmamanasikārādanattamākāśamityākāśānattyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharatyayaṃ caturtho vimokṣaḥ | 4
SA08n996:1518: sa sarvaśa ākāśānattyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānattaṃ vijñānamiti vijñānānattyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharatyayaṃ pañcamo vimokṣaḥ | 5
SA08n996:1519: sa sarvaśo vijñānānattyāyatanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiñcidityākiñcanyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharatyayaṃ ṣaṣṭo vimokṣaḥ | 6
SA08n996:1520: sa sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharatyayaṃ saptamo vimokṣaḥ | 7
SA08n996:1521: sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samatikramya saṃdjñāveditanirodhaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatyayamaṣṭamo vimokṣaḥ | 8  ||71 ||
SA08n996:1523: adhyātmanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni tāni khalu nūpāṇyabhibhūya jānātyabhibhūya paśyati evaṃsaṃjñī ca bhavati idaṃ prathamamabhibhvāyatanam | 1
SA08n996:1524: adhyātmanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati mahadganāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni tāni khalu nūpāṇyabhibhūya jānātyabhibhūya paśyati evaṃsaṃjñī ca bhavati idaṃ dvitīyamabhibhvāyatanam | 2
SA08n996:1525: adhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni tadyathā umakapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇaseyaṃ vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsaṃ evamevādhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni idaṃ tṛtīyamabhibhvāyatanam | 3
SA08n996:1526: adhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati pītāni pītavarṇāni pītanidarśanāni pītanirbhāsāni tadyathā karṇikārapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇaseyaṃ vastraṃ pītaṃ pītavarṇaṃ pītanidarśanaṃ pītanirbhāsaṃ evamevādhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati pītavarṇāni pītanidarśanāni pītanirbhāsāni idaṃ caturthamabhibhvāyatanam | 4
SA08n996:1527: adhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni lohitavarṇāni lohitanidarśanāni lohitanirbhāsāni tadyathā bandhujīvakapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇaseyaṃ vastraṃ lohitaṃ lohitavarṇaṃ lohitanidarśanaṃ lohitanirbhāsaṃ evamevādhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni lohitavarṇāni lohitanidarśanāni lohitanirbhāsāni idaṃ pañcamamabhibhvāyatanaṃ | 5
SA08n996:1528: adhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati avadātāni avadātavarṇāni avadātanidarśanāni avadātanirbhāsāni tadyathā uśanastārakāyavarṇa avadāta avadātavarṇa avadātanidarśana avadātanirbhāsaḥ evamevādhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati avadātāni avadātavarṇāni avadātanidarśanāni avadātanirbhāsāni idaṃ ṣaṣṭhabhibhvāyatanam | 6
SA08n996:1529: sa sarvaśo nūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramātpratighasaṃjñānāmastaṃgamānnānātvasaṃjñānāmamanasikārādanattamākāśamityākāśānattyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharati idaṃ saptamamabhibhvāyatanam | 7
SA08n996:1530: sa sarvaśa ākāśānattyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānattaṃ vijñānamiti vijñānānattyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharati idamaṣṭamamabhibhvāyatanaṃ | 8  ||72 ||
SA08n996:2220: 6 yadapīcchayā paryeṣamāṇo na labhate tadapi duḥkhaṃ |
SA08n996:4570: 10 bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ |
SA08n996:4572: 11 naiva bhavati na na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt |
SA08n996:6169: 52 tena hi śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru |
SA08n996:6227: bhūyasyā mātrayā abhidyotayamāno gāthābhigītena saṃprakāśayati sma |
SA08n996:7819: 23 iti hi tachākṣaṇagaṇanayā sumeruparvatarājo lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gacchet |
SA08n996:8353: 7 na nāgaśīrṣaka nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā |
SA08n996:8393: 46 nodanena sūpikaṃ praticchādayiṣyāmaḥ sūpikena vā odanaṃ |
SA08n996:8422: 75 na taṭe na prapāte na prāgbhāre pātraṃ sthāpayiṣyāmaḥ |
SA08n996:8426: 79 na nīcatarake āsane niṣaṇa uccatarake āsane niṣaṇāyā glānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ |
SA08n996:8427: 80 na pṛṣṭhato gacchattaḥ purato gacchate aglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ |
SA08n996:8428: 81 notpathena gacchattaḥ pathena gacchata aglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ |
SA08n996:8450: 103 nāglānā udaka uccāraprasrāvaṃ kheṭaṃ siṅgāṇakaṃ vāttaṃ viriktaṃ chorayiṣyāmaḥ |
SA08n996:8451: 104 nāglānāḥ saharitapradeśe uccāraprasrāvaṃ kheṭaṃ śiṅgāṇakaṃ vāttaṃ viriktaṃ chorayiṣyāmaḥ |
SA08n996:8452: 105 nāsādhikaṃ pauruṣyaṃ vṛkṣamadhirokṣyāma anyatrāpada iti śikṣa karaṇīyā | 106  ||264 ||
